entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SPRINKLES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
